translations: v.大口咕嘟地喝；汩汩地倒出来（glug 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Glugging milk from a bottle, Amara Chiedozie looks like any other contented three-week-old.
sentences.translation: 当她咕咚咕咚的啜饮着奶瓶里的牛奶，阿玛拉·凯达西看起来和其他三周大的宝宝一样感到满足。 a。

sentences.sentence: Forget glugging countless1 glasses of water or getting your beauty sleep. The secret of looking young is simply to stay out of the sun.
sentences.translation: 别再热衷于疯狂饮水和睡美容觉了。青春常驻的秘诀其实只有一个：远离阳光。
